It can be used normally after pairing is successful, click to view the device operation guide FITALENT running check detail exercise record off Back today Notice: 1. The firmware upgrade is expected to take 5 to 10 minutes, please wait patiently;\n2. During the upgrade process, please do not turn off the phone\'s bluetooth and keep the screen on.\n3. Please keep the device close to the mobile phone,and do not walk far away or exit the APP;\ n4. Before upgrading, please make sure that the battery of the device is more than 40% ;\n5. After the upgrade done, please ignore the device in the system Bluetooth setting;\n6. If the upgrade fails, please select the DFU device name to connect and try again. s min h Are you sure you want to unbind? To use the message reminder function, you need to turn on the notification switch of the mobile phone. Is it turned on? Scan complete sync..

Currently the last version size: save success Share Sport detail History "HRrest: The number of heartbeats per minute in a normal person is generally 60 to 100 in a quiet state.\n Only by selecting an appropriate heart rate interval can a better exercise state be achieved, and an appropriate heart rate interval can be used to achieve a better exercise effect. \n*The data and suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment "Blood pressure is the pressure that blood exerts on the walls of blood vessels as it flows through the blood vessels.\n The blood pressure range of Normal adults at rest state is relatively stable, with normal systolic blood pressure ranging from 90 to 139 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure from 60 to 89 mmHg.\n*The data and suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment." Sleep is one of the important life-sustaining behaviors of beings. The hardware device records your sleep status, analyzes the sleep quality, and helps you understand and adjust your sleep habits. \n*The data suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment Blood oxygen saturation refers to the concentration of blood oxygen in the blood, which is an indicator of the ability of the blood to carry oxygen. The higher the oxygen content in the blood is, the metabolism of a person is better. It will change due to personal physical condition, altitude, etc.\nThe normal blood oxygen saturation of the human body is above 95%.\n* The data and suggestions provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment.

unauthorized authorized Push SMS messages to the watch for display Permission description Fitalent permissions instructions To ensure the normal use of the APP, please enable the following permissions ACCESS_BLUETOOTH Need to use the phone\'s Bluetooth function to connect to the Bluetooth watch Use Location Map running track record and search Bluetooth watch need to turn on the phone GPS switch ACCESS_LOCAL Get high-precision position information for running Camera permission use Use the camera to take a picture as an avatar ACCESS_WRITE The camera takes a picture and saves, select a picture from the album as the avatar ACCESS_CAMERA Message reminder function, incoming call reminds the watch to check the current incoming call status ACCESS_CONTACTS When a call comes in, the watch can display the name and phone number
